nodes.excerpt: Step aside fantasy football! There's a new way to play. Draft members of Congress for your team, score points from their actions, and get the most points during your season to win. Fantasy Congress is a blast with friends, and you might learn a thing or two!

nodes.excerpt: The app calculates well-known SaaS metrics from your subscriptions data in Google Sheets. Prepare your data in a recognized format. Include Customer ID, start date, end date and monthly value of subscriptions. Once you have it ready you can calculate SaaS-related subscriptions based on it.
nodes.title: Probe - Calculate your SaaS metrics with one click in Google Sheets
nodes.author: Aliaksei Kulbei

localize.description: 该应用程序根据您在Google Sheet中的订阅数据计算出知名的SaaS指标。以可识别的格式准备数据。包括订阅的客户ID、开始日期、结束日期和月值。一旦准备就绪，您就可以根据它计算与SaaS相关的订阅量。
localize.tagline: 在Google Sheets中单击一下即可计算您的SaaS指标

localize.description: 該應用程序根據您在Google Sheet中的訂閱數據計算出知名的SaaS指標。以可識別的格式準備數據。包括訂閱的客戶ID、開始日期、結束日期和月值。一旦準備就緒，您就可以根據它計算與SaaS相關的訂閱量。
localize.tagline: 在Google Sheets中單擊一下即可計算您的SaaS指標

localize.description: 哈罗德是一种你实际上可以坚持使用的习惯跟踪方法。不再更新谷歌电子表格，然后再也不看它。哈罗德会帮你追踪的。开始养成那些日常习惯，释放你的潜力。

nodes.excerpt: Baaz enables live video commerce for retailers globally. A retail store can host live videos, manage catalogs, live chats, payments, shipping, promotions and influencers from Baaz app. All things related to live video shopping in one place.
nodes.title: Baaz - Create virtual showroom in less than 1 min & sell online
nodes.author: Chitresh Parihar

localize.description: Baaz为全球零售商提供现场视频商务服务。零售店可以托管实时视频，管理目录，实时聊天，支付，送货，促销和Baaz应用程序的影响力。所有与视频直播购物相关的东西都集中在一个地方。
localize.tagline: 在不到1分钟的时间内创建虚拟展厅并在线销售

localize.description: Baaz爲全球零售商提供現場視頻商務服務。零售店可以託管實時視頻，管理目錄，實時聊天，支付，送貨，促銷和Baaz應用程序的影響力。所有與視頻直播購物相關的東西都集中在一個地方。
localize.tagline: 在不到1分鐘的時間內創建虛擬展廳並在線銷售
